anya-e0103n1:2_3: Sīlasamādhipaññāmukhenāti ‘‘sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā’’tiādīsu (dha. pa. 277; theragā. 676; netti.
anya-e0103n1:2_4: 5) viya vipassanāmattādimukhena saṅkhepato adesetvā sīlasamādhipaññāmukhena desitopi,
anya-e0103n1:2_5: sattatiṁsāyapi vā bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṁ visuddhimaggantogadhattā tattha sīlasamādhipaññā mukhaṁ pamukhaṁ katvā desitopi.
anya-e0103n1:3_1: Kenaṭṭhena sīlanti kena atthena sīlanti vuccati,
anya-e0103n1:3_2: ‘‘sīla’’nti padaṁ kaṁ abhidheyyaṁ nissāya pavattanti attho.
anya-e0103n1:3_6: Paṭipatti nāma diṭṭhānisaṁse eva hotīti āha ‘‘kimānisaṁsa’’nti.
anya-e0103n1:3_11: Taṁ icchantena yasmā upāyakosallatthinā anupāyakosallaṁ viya saṁkileso jānitabboti āha ‘‘ko cassa saṁkileso’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:4_3: Pucchito hi attho avibhāvitattā nigūḷho muṭṭhiyaṁ kato viya tiṭṭhati.
anya-e0103n1:4_7: Tassa saraseneva patanasabhāvassa antare eva ativa pātanaṁ atipāto,
anya-e0103n1:4_8: saṇikaṁ patituṁ adatvā sīghaṁ pātananti attho,
anya-e0103n1:4_9: atikkamma vā satthādīhi abhibhavitvā pātanaṁ atipāto,
anya-e0103n1:4_16: Cetanādayo dhammāti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṁ pāḷivasena vibhajitvā dassetuṁ ‘‘vuttañheta’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:4_18: attanā sampayuttadhammehi saddhiṁ ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho.
anya-e0103n1:4_19: Cetanāya anukūlavaseneva hi taṁsampayuttā dhammā ārammaṇe pavattanti.
anya-e0103n1:4_21: idha pana sīlacetanā adhippetāti katvā ‘‘kusalā’’ti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n1:4_24: Cetanāya satipi cetasikatte ‘‘cetanā sīla’’nti visuṁ gahitattā tadaññameva viratianabhijjhādikaṁ cetasikaṁ sīlaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ gobalībaddañāyena.
anya-e0103n1:4_26: Yathā akusalā dhammā citte na otaranti,
anya-e0103n1:4_29: Tattha cetanā sīlaṁ nāmātiādi yathāvuttassa suttapadassa vivaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:4_32: Viramantassa viratīti viratiyā padhānabhāvaṁ gahetvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:5_3: 539) vacanato pāṇātipātādīnaṁ paṭipakkhabhūtā tabbirativisiṭṭhā cetanā tathāpavattā padhānabhāvena pāṇātipātādipaṭiviratisādhikā hoti,
anya-e0103n1:5_4: tadā taṁsampayuttā viratianabhijjhādayo ca cetanāpakkhikā vā,
anya-e0103n1:5_5: abbohārikā vāti imamatthaṁ sandhāya cetanāsīlaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:5_6: Yadā pana pāṇātipātādīhi saṅkocaṁ āpajjantassa tato viramaṇākārena pavattamānā cetanāvisiṭṭhā virati,
anya-e0103n1:5_7: anabhijjhādayo ca tattha tattha padhānabhāvena kiccasādhikā honti,
anya-e0103n1:5_8: tadā taṁsampayuttā cetanā viratiādipakkhikā vā hoti,
anya-e0103n1:5_9: abbohārikā vāti imamatthaṁ sandhāya cetasikasīlaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:6_0: Idāni sutte āgatanayena kusalakammapathavasena cetanācetasikasīlāni vibhajitvā dassetuṁ ‘‘apicā’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:6_1: Pajahantassāti samādānavasena ‘‘ito paṭṭhāya na karissāmī’’ti sampattavatthukānipi anajjhācaraṇena pajahantassa.
anya-e0103n1:6_2: Satta kammapathacetanāti pāṇātipātādipahānasādhikā paṭipāṭiyā satta kusalakammapathacetanā.
anya-e0103n1:6_4: tassa pahāyakā anabhijjhādayo sīlanti āha ‘‘cetasikaṁ sīlaṁ nāma anabhijjhā…pe…
anya-e0103n1:7_1: ‘‘Sotānaṁ saṁvaraṁ brūmī’’ti vatvā ‘‘paññāyete pidhiyyare’’ti vacanena sotānaṁ saṁvaro pidahanaṁ samucchedanaṁ ñāṇanti viññāyati.
anya-e0103n1:8_0: Idamatthikataṁ manasi katvā yena ñāṇena yoniso paccavekkhitvā paccayā paṭisevīyanti.
anya-e0103n1:8_1: Taṁ paccayapaṭisevanampi ñāṇasabhāvattā ettheva ñāṇasaṁvare eva samodhānaṁ saṅgahaṁ gacchati.
anya-e0103n1:8_3: Uppannanti tasmiṁ tasmiṁ ārammaṇe jātaṁ nibbattaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:8_5: Nādhivāsetīti cittaṁ āropetvā abbhantare na vāseti.
anya-e0103n1:8_6: Ājīvapārisuddhipīti buddhapaṭikuṭṭhaṁ micchājīvaṁ pahāya anavajjena paccayapariyesanena sijjhanakaṁ ājīvapārisuddhisīlampi
anya-e0103n1:8_7: ettheva vīriyasaṁvare eva samodhānaṁ gacchati vīriyasādhanattā.
anya-e0103n1:8_8: Ettha ca yathā ñāṇaṁ taṇhādisotānaṁ pavattinivāraṇato pidahanaṭṭhena saṁvaraṇato saṁvaro ca,
anya-e0103n1:8_10: evaṁ khanti anadhivāsanena uppajjanakakilesānaṁ adhivāsanena saṁvaraṇato saṁvaro ca,
anya-e0103n1:8_12: vīriyaṁ vinodetabbānaṁ pāpadhammānaṁ vinodanena saṁvaraṇato saṁvaro ca,
anya-e0103n1:8_13: vinodanahetu uppajjanakaguṇānaṁ ādhārādibhāvato sīlanaṭṭhena sīlanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:8_14: Yathā pana pātimokkhasīlādi tassa tassa pāpadhammassa pavattituṁ appadānavasena saṁvaraṇaṁ pidahanaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:8_16: evaṁ asamādinnasīlassa āgatavatthuto viramaṇampīti āha ‘‘yā ca pāpabhīrukānaṁ…pe…
anya-e0103n1:9_4: na sammā ṭhapitāti asaṇṭhapitā vippakiṇṇā visaṭā ca nāma honti,
anya-e0103n1:9_5: susīlyavasena pana pavattā tabbipariyāyato saṇṭhapitā avippakiṇṇā avisaṭā ca nāma honti yathā taṁ okkhittacakkhutā abāhuppacālanādi.
anya-e0103n1:9_16: Tattha kusaladhammā nāma sapubbabhāgā mahaggatānuttarā dhammā.
anya-e0103n1:9_18: Siraṭṭhoti yathā sirasi chinne sabbo attabhāvo vinassati,
anya-e0103n1:9_19: evaṁ sīle bhinne sabbaṁ guṇasarīraṁ vinassati.
anya-e0103n1:9_21: ‘‘Siro sīsa’’nti vā vattabbe niruttinayena ‘‘sīla’’nti vuttanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n1:9_23: Tena ta-kārassa lopaṁ katvā niruttinayeneva ‘‘sīla’’nti vuttanti dasseti.
anya-e0103n1:9_25: Evamādināti ādi-saddena sayanti akusalā etasmiṁ sati apaviṭṭhā hontīti sīlaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:9_26: supanti vā tena vihatussāhāni sabbaduccaritānīti sīlaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:9_27: sabbesaṁ vā kusaladhammānaṁ pavesārahasālāti sīlanti evamādīnaṁ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n1:10_1: ‘‘Sīlanaṭṭhena sīla’’nti pubbe saddatthuddhārena pakāsitopi bhāvattho evāti āha ‘‘sīlanaṁ lakkhaṇaṁ tassā’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:10_2: Na hi tassa cetanādibhedabhinnassa anavasesato saṅgāhako tato añño attho atthi,
anya-e0103n1:10_4: Nanu ca anekabhedasaṅgāhakaṁ sāmaññalakkhaṇaṁ nāma siyā,
anya-e0103n1:10_5: na visesalakkhaṇanti anuyogaṁ manasi katvā āha ‘‘sanidassanattaṁ rūpassa,
anya-e0103n1:11_0: Yathā hi nīlādivasena anekabhedabhinnassāpi rūpāyatanassa sanidassanattaṁ visesalakkhaṇaṁ tadaññadhammāsādhāraṇato.
anya-e0103n1:11_6: Tassa pana rūpāyatanato anaññattepi aññehi dhammehi rūpāyatanaṁ visesetuṁ aññaṁ viya katvā saha nidassanena sanidassananti vuccati.
anya-e0103n1:11_7: Dhammasabhāvasāmaññena hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro sabhāvo,
anya-e0103n1:11_8: so aññaṁ viya katvā upacarituṁ yutto.
anya-e0103n1:11_10: Atha vā ‘‘saha nidassanenā’’ti ettha tabbhāvattho saha-saddo yathā nandirāgasahagatāti (saṁ. ni. 5.1081; mahāva. 14; paṭi. ma. 2.30).
anya-e0103n1:12_6: Keci pana ‘‘kiccamevā’’ti avadhāraṇaṁ tassa itararasato balavabhāvadassanatthanti vadanti,
anya-e0103n1:12_9: sampatti eva vā rasoti imassa atthassa adhippetattā.
anya-e0103n1:13_7: Imassa pana ānisaṁsaphalassa ānisaṁsakathāyaṁ vakkhamānattā idha aggahaṇaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:13_8: Keci pana phalassa anicchitattā idha aggahaṇanti vadanti,
anya-e0103n1:15_3: yassa me suparisuddhaṁ sīla’’nti attano sīlassa paccavekkhaṇavasena pavattoti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n1:15_10: Añño eva panānena nipphādetabbo samādhiādiguṇoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n1:16_0: Sīlavato sīlasampadāyāti parisuddhaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ katvā sīlassa sampādanena sīlavato,
anya-e0103n1:16_7: Visāradoti attani kiñci garahitabbaṁ upavaditabbaṁ apassanto vigatasārajjo nibbhayo.
anya-e0103n1:16_11: kusalakammādīnaṁyeva ca tadā upaṭṭhānato amūḷho pasannamānaso eva kālaṁkaroti.
anya-e0103n1:16_18: Sā hi rūpādīhi visayehi suṭṭhu aggoti saggo,
anya-e0103n1:16_19: lokiyati ettha uḷāraṁ puññaphalanti lokoti ca vuccati.
anya-e0103n1:17_1: Piyo ca assanti piyāyitabbo piyacakkhūhi passitabbo pemaniyo bhaveyyanti attho.
anya-e0103n1:17_8: Sīlesvevassa paripūrakārīti catupārisuddhisīlesu eva paripūrakārī assa,
anya-e0103n1:17_10: ‘‘Ādinā nayenā’’ti etena ‘‘ajjhattaṁ cetosamathamanuyutto anirākatajjhāno vipassanāya samannāgato brūhetā suññāgārāna’’nti (ma. ni.
anya-e0103n1:18_1: atha kho aññepi bahū sīlānisaṁsā vijjantīti te dassetuṁ ‘‘apicā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:18_3: Ācārakulaputtānaṁ yaṁ sīlaṁ vinā patiṭṭhā avaṭṭhānaṁ natthi,
anya-e0103n1:18_4: tassa evaṁ mahānubhāvassa sīlassa ānisaṁsānaṁ paricchedaṁ parimāṇaṁ ko vade ko vattuṁ sakkuṇeyyāti attho.
anya-e0103n1:18_5: Etena sabbesaṁyeva lokiyalokuttarānaṁ guṇānaṁ sīlameva mūlabhūtanti dassetvā tato parampi malavisodhanena,
anya-e0103n1:18_10: kittipāmojjajanena ca sīlasadisaṁ aññaṁ sattānaṁ hitasukhāvahaṁ natthīti dassento ‘‘na gaṅgā’’tiādikā gāthā abhāsi.
anya-e0103n1:19_5: Pāṇanaṭṭhena pāṇīnaṁ sattānaṁ yaṁ malaṁ sīlajalaṁ visodhayati,
anya-e0103n1:19_6: taṁ malaṁ visodhetuṁ na sakkuṇanti gaṅgādayo nadiyoti paṭhamagāthāya na-kāraṁ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:19_13: Tenāha bhagavā ‘‘satañca gandho paṭivātametī’’ti (dha. pa. 54; a. ni. 3.80; mi. pa. 5.4.1).
anya-e0103n1:19_15: taṁ tesaṁ kātuṁ adentaṁ sīlaṁ dosānaṁ balaṁ ghātetīti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:22_0: Caranti tena sīlesu paripūrakāritaṁ upagacchantīti carittaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:22_2: Vāritato tena attānaṁ tāyanti rakkhantīti vārittaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:22_16: yathāparicchinno vā kālo pariyanto etassāti kālapariyantaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:22_17: Yāva pāṇanaṁ jīvanaṁ koṭi etassāti āpāṇakoṭikaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:24_2: Idaṁ kattabbanti paññattasikkhāpadapūraṇanti idaṁ ābhisamācārikaṁ kattabbaṁ paṭipajjitabbanti evaṁ paññattassa sikkhāpadasīlassa pūraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:24_3: Sikkhāpadasīlaṁ hi pūrento sikkhāpadampi pūreti pāleti nāma.
anya-e0103n1:24_7: Idaṁ na kattabbanti paṭikkhittassa akaraṇanti idaṁ duccaritaṁ na kattabbanti bhagavatā paṭikkhittassa akaraṇaṁ viramaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:24_8: Caranti tasminti tasmiṁ sīle taṁsamaṅgino carantīti sīlassa adhikaraṇataṁ vibhāvento tesaṁ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n1:24_10: Vāritanti idaṁ na kattabbanti paṭikkhittaṁ akappiyaṁ .
anya-e0103n1:24_21: saddho eva satthārā paṭikkhitte aṇumattepi vajje bhayadassāvī samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti āha ‘‘saddhāsādhanaṁ vāritta’’nti.
anya-e0103n1:25_6: taṁ ārabbha uddissa tadatthaṁ tappayojanaṁ paññattaṁ ābhisamācārikaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:25_10: Tattha kāmaṁ ājīvahetukato sattavidhaduccaritato virati sammāājīvoti sopi sattavidho hoti,
anya-e0103n1:25_11: sammājīvatāsāmaññena pana taṁ ekaṁ katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:25_12: Atha vā tividhakuhanavatthusannissayato micchājīvato viratiṁ ekajjhaṁ katvā vutto ‘‘ājīvo suparisuddho’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:25_13: Seṭṭhacariyabhāvato maggo eva brahmacariyanti maggabrahmacariyaṁ, tassa.
anya-e0103n1:25_14: Ādibhāvabhūtanti ādimhi bhāvetabbataṁ nipphādetabbataṁ bhūtaṁ pattaṁ ādibhāvabhūtaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:25_17: Tassa sampattiyāti ābhisamācārikassa sampajjanena paripūraṇena ādibrahmacariyakaṁ sampajjati.
anya-e0103n1:25_19: so garukāni mahāsāvajjāni bahvādīnavāni parivajjessatīti vattabbameva natthīti.
anya-e0103n1:25_22: Taṁ hi upariguṇavisesānaṁ dhāraṇaṭṭhena dhammoti vuccati.
anya-e0103n1:26_0: Viratisīlassa itarasīlena satipi sampayogādike asammissakatādassanatthaṁ ‘‘veramaṇimatta’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:27_3: Diṭṭhicarito hi asatipi diṭṭhiyā taṇhāvirahe diṭṭhinissitova pavattati.
anya-e0103n1:28_3: Kālaparicchedaṁ akatvā samādinnampi antarāvicchinnaṁ sampattavirativasena yāvajīvaṁ pavattitampi āpāṇakoṭikaṁ
anya-e0103n1:28_4: na hotīti dassetuṁ ‘‘yāvajīvaṁ samādiyitvā tatheva pavattita’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:29_1: uppannānaṁ rakkhaṇavasena ceva vaḍḍhanavasena ca ñātiaṅgajīvitānaṁ avināsanavasena.
anya-e0103n1:29_2: Kiṁ so vītikkamissatīti yo vītikkamāya cittampi na uppādeti,
anya-e0103n1:30_0: Ārammaṇabhāvena vaṇo viya āsave kāmāsavādike paggharatīti sampayogabhāvābhāvepi sahāsavehīti sāsavaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:30_1: Tebhūmakadhammajātanti sīlaṁ tappariyāpannanti āha ‘‘sāsavaṁ sīlaṁ lokiya’’nti.
anya-e0103n1:31_4: Yatheva hi kammaṁ āyūhanavasena hīnādibhedabhinnaṁ hoti,
anya-e0103n1:31_6: So ca nesaṁ pavattiākāro adhimuttibhedenāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:31_9: ‘‘Kathaṁ nāma mādiso īdisaṁ kareyyā’’ti pāpajigucchāya ariyabhāvaṁ nissāya.
anya-e0103n1:31_16: Yā karuṇūpāyakosallapariggahitā mahābodhiṁ ārabbha pavattā paramukkaṁsagatasoceyyasallekhā desakālasattādivikapparahitā sīlapāramitā.
anya-e0103n1:32_1: Attā eva garu adhipati etassāti attagaru,
anya-e0103n1:32_8: Tasmā ‘‘naṁ sīlasampadāya pūjessāmī’’ti evaṁ dhammamahattaṁ pūjetukāmena.
anya-e0103n1:33_1: Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo hi ‘‘imināhaṁ sīlena devo vā bhavissāmi devaññataro vā,
anya-e0103n1:33_2: iminā me sīlena saṁsārasuddhi bhavissatī’’ti pavattassa sīlaṁ parāmasantiyo taṁ parābhavaṁ pāpenti maggassa anupanissayabhāvakaraṇato.
anya-e0103n1:33_4: So hi puthujjanova hutvā kalyāṇehi sīlādīhi samannāgato.
anya-e0103n1:33_6: samucchindanato ca tehi na parāmaṭṭhanti aparāmaṭṭhaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:33_7: Tassa tassa kilesadarathassa paṭippassambhanato vūpasamanato paṭippassaddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:34_1: Evaṁ hi taṁ sīlaṁ paṭipākatikameva hoti.
anya-e0103n1:34_3: ‘‘Katapaṭikamma’’nti iminā ca ‘‘na punevaṁ karissa’’nti adhiṭṭhānampi saṅgahitanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:34_9: na nu kho vītikkanta’’ntiādinā ajjhācāre vā vematikassa saṁsayāpannassa.
anya-e0103n1:34_14: Vimati paṭivinetabbāti sayaṁ vā taṁ vatthuṁ vicāretvā,
anya-e0103n1:36_3: Ekaccaṁ abyākataṁ sīlaṁ idhādhippetasīlena ekasaṅgahanti akusalassevāyujjamānataṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘tattha akusala’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:36_6: Vuttanayenevāti vutteneva nayena kusalattikaṁ aggahetvā hīnattikādīnaṁ pañcannaṁ tikānaṁ vasena assa sīlassa tividhatā veditabbā.
anya-e0103n1:37_4: Tassa hi sīlavante anupasaṅkamitvā dussīle sevantassa tato eva tesaṁ diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjanena paṇṇattivītikkame
anya-e0103n1:37_5: adosadassāvino micchāsaṅkappabahulatāya manacchaṭṭhāni indriyāni arakkhato sīlaṁ ekaṁseneva hānabhāgiyaṁ hoti,
anya-e0103n1:37_11: Sampādite hi samādhismiṁ sīlassa samādhisaṁvattaniyatā nicchiyati.
anya-e0103n1:38_0: Yāni ca sikkhāpadāni nesaṁ rakkhitabbānīti sambandho,
anya-e0103n1:38_4: Sati vā ussāheti ussakkitvā sīlāni rakkhituṁ ussāhe sati.
anya-e0103n1:38_6: Aṭṭhāti naccādimālādiveramaṇiṁ ekaṁ katvā sabbapacchimavajjāni aṭṭha.
anya-e0103n1:39_3: Mariyādācārittanti tassa tassa sāvajjassa akaraṇe mariyādabhūtaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:39_4: tattha tattha kulādīsu pubbapurisehi ṭhapitaṁ cārittaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:39_11: pāsaṁ vā bādhaṁ ariyavinayassa ḍetīti ‘‘pāsaṇḍa’’nti vuccati.
anya-e0103n1:39_14: Idaṁ pana ukkaṁsagataṁ bodhisattapitaripi cittuppādamattenapi asaṁkiliṭṭhaṁ ‘‘dhammatāsīla’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:39_17: Sīlapāramiṁ hi paramukkaṁsaṁ pāpetvā kucchigatassa mahābodhisattassa sīlatejena guṇānubhāvena bodhisattamātu
anya-e0103n1:39_20: Te kira suciraṁ kālaṁ suparisuddhasīlā eva hutvā āgatā.
anya-e0103n1:39_23: Pubbe purimajātiyaṁ siddho hetu etassāti pubbahetukasīlaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:39_24: Idaṁ pana pakatisīlādisamādānena vinā avītikkamalakkhaṇaṁ sampattaviratisaṅgahaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:40_0: Yaṁ bhagavatā evaṁ vuttaṁ sīlanti sambandho.
anya-e0103n1:40_6: suññā parappavādā samaṇebhi aññehī’’ti (dī. ni. 2.214; ma. ni. 1.139; a. ni. 4.241).
anya-e0103n1:40_12: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti idaṁ pātimokkhato acavanabhāvaparidīpanaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:41_7: Disvā na nimittaggāhī hoti nānubyañjanaggāhīti saṁvarassa upāyaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n1:41_9: anvāssaveyyunti saṁvarassa paṭipakkhaṁ tattha ādīnavaṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n1:41_10: Saṁvarāya paṭipajjatīti pageva satiyā upaṭṭhapetabbataṁ dasseti.
anya-e0103n1:41_11: Rakkhati cakkhundriyanti satiyā upaṭṭhāpanameva cakkhundriyassa ārakkhāti dasseti.
anya-e0103n1:41_12: Cakkhundriye saṁvaraṁ āpajjatīti tathābhūtā satiyevettha saṁvaroti dasseti.
anya-e0103n1:41_14: Channaṁ sikkhāpadānanti ‘‘ājīvahetu ājīvakāraṇā asantaṁ abhūtaṁ uttarimanussadhammaṁ ullapatī’’tiādinā
anya-e0103n1:41_16: Sāmantajappanādinā tividhena kuhanavatthunā vimhāpanaṁ kuhanā. Attānaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:41_17: dāyakaṁ vā ukkhipitvā yathā so kiñci dadāti,
anya-e0103n1:41_23: Gandhādayo viya lābhāya paresaṁ akkosanādinā nipisatīti nippeso,
anya-e0103n1:41_26: Mahicchatāya attanā laddhalābhena parato lābhapariyesanā lābhena lābhaṁ nijigīsanatā.
anya-e0103n1:43_4: Paṭhamassa atthassa sabbasādhāraṇattā asādhāraṇaṁ pabbajitāveṇikaṁ pariyāyaṁ dassento ‘‘chinnabhinnapaṭadharāditāya vā’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n1:43_6: Bhinnapaṭadharādibhāvo ca nāma daliddassāpi niggahitassa hotīti tato visesetuṁ ‘‘saddhāpabbajito’’ti
anya-e0103n1:43_8: Ācārakulaputto vā hi paṭipajjituṁ sakkoti jātikulaputto vā.
anya-e0103n1:43_19: Yasmā pana so sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ avītikkamo vītikkamapaṭipakkhoti katvā,
anya-e0103n1:43_22: Tathābhūto ca yasmā taṁ upeto tena ca samaṅgī nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n1:44_3: puññakiriyāya ca dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṁ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī,
anya-e0103n1:44_5: Aniccatāya vā bhavādīsu kammavegakkhitto ghaṭiyantaṁ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti pātī,
anya-e0103n1:44_6: maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa pātanasīloti pātī,
anya-e0103n1:44_13: Atha vā avijjādinā hetunā saṁsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pātī,
anya-e0103n1:44_16: Tassa pātino sattassa taṇhādisaṁkilesattayato mokkho etenāti pātimokkhaṁ .
anya-e0103n1:44_18: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:44_26: taṇhādutiyo puriso’’ti (itivu. 15, 105; a. ni. 4.9; mahāni. 191; cūḷani.
anya-e0103n1:44_32: chasu kubbati santhava’’nti (saṁ. ni. 1.70; su. ni. 171).
anya-e0103n1:44_34: Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṁsāro.
anya-e0103n1:44_36: atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā ‘‘patī’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n1:44_40: Sabbaguṇānaṁ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttenatthena mokkho cāti patimokkho,
anya-e0103n1:45_5: samucchedavasena ca accantaṁ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:45_7: tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṁ mokkhoti attho,
anya-e0103n1:45_11: Sīlasaṁvaro hi sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṁ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgo viya yathārahaṁ kilesanibbāpanato,
anya-e0103n1:45_15: patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evamettha pātimokkha-saddassa attho veditabbo.
anya-e0103n1:45_17: ‘‘Viharatī’’ti iminā pātimokkhasaṁvarasīle ṭhitassa bhikkhuno iriyāpathavihāro dassito.
anya-e0103n1:46_4: yathā vā sasīsanhānena pahīnasedamalajallikassa mālāgandhavilepanādivibhūsanasaṁvidhānaṁ yuttarūpaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:46_6: atthi anācāro’’ti dvayaṁ uddisitvā anācāraṁ tāva vibhajituṁ ‘‘tattha katamo anācāro’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:47_1: Idāni mānasaṁ anācāraṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘sabbampi dussīlyaṁ anācāro’’ti vatvā tattha ekacciyaṁ dassento ‘‘idhekacco veḷudānena vā’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n1:47_4: Veḷūti manussānaṁ payojanāvaho yo koci veḷudaṇḍo.
anya-e0103n1:47_12: Cāṭukamyatā attānaṁ dāsaṁ viya nīcaṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā parassa khalitavacanaṁ saṇṭhapetvā piyakāmatāya paggayhavacanaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:47_14: Yathā hi muggasūpe paccante bahū muggā paccanti,
anya-e0103n1:47_16: evaṁ saccālikena jīvitakappane bahu alikaṁ hoti,
anya-e0103n1:47_23: Tesaṁ tesaṁ gihīnaṁ gāmantaradesantarādīsu sāsanapaṭisāsanaharaṇaṁ jaṅghapesanikaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:47_28: Ayaṁ vuccati anācāroti ayaṁ sabbopi ‘‘anācāro’’ti kathīyati.
anya-e0103n1:48_0: Gocaraniddesepi paṭhamaṁ agocarassa vacane kāraṇaṁ heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:48_18: Tesaṁ aññamaññaṁ visabhāgavatthubhāvato santhavavasena upasaṅkamane katipāheneva brahmacariyantarāyo siyā,
anya-e0103n1:48_23: Tattha tehi soṇḍatādivasena na upasaṅkamitabbaṁ brahmacariyantarāyakarattā.
anya-e0103n1:48_24: Saṁsaṭṭho viharati rājūhītiādīsu rājāno nāma ye rajjamanusāsanti.
anya-e0103n1:48_28: Ananulomikena saṁsaggenāti tissannaṁ sikkhānaṁ ananulomikena paccanīkabhūtena saṁsaggena saṁsaṭṭho viharati,
anya-e0103n1:48_29: yena brahmacariyantarāyaṁ vā sallekhaparihāniṁ vā pāpuṇāti.
anya-e0103n1:49_0: Idāni aparenapi pariyāyena agocaraṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘yāni vā pana tānī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:49_5: Akkosakaparibhāsakānīti akkosavatthūhi akkosakāni ceva bhayadassanena santajjanakāni ca.
anya-e0103n1:49_6: Atthaṁ na icchanti anatthameva icchantīti anatthakāmāni.
anya-e0103n1:49_7: Hitaṁ na icchanti ahitameva icchantīti ahitakāmāni.
anya-e0103n1:49_8: Phāsu na icchanti aphāsuṁyeva icchantīti aphāsukakāmāni.
anya-e0103n1:49_19: assaddhakulādiko ca taṁ taṁ sevantassa tippakāropi ayutto gocaroti agocaro.
anya-e0103n1:50_2: bhikkhunīsaṅghassa ca catumahāpathe khatapokkharaṇī viya yathāsukhaṁ ogāhanakkhamāni.
anya-e0103n1:50_6: nikkhamantānañca bhikkhubhikkhunīsaṅkhātānaṁ isīnaṁ cīvaravātena ceva samiñjanapasāraṇādijanitasarīravātena
anya-e0103n1:51_0: Idāni niddese āgatanayenāpi ācāragocare dassetuṁ ‘‘apicā’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:51_9: Ṭhitakopīti upari tiṭṭhanto viya āsannataraṭṭhāne ṭhitakopi bhaṇati.
anya-e0103n1:51_13: There bhikkhū anupakhajjāti therānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṁ anupavisitvā tesaṁ āsannataraṭṭhānaṁ upagantvā.
anya-e0103n1:52_0: Apica bhikkhūtiādi sabbasseva bhikkhuno ācāradassanavasena pavattaṁ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:52_12: Eseva nayo ito paresupi chasu padesu.
anya-e0103n1:52_16: Indriyesu guttadvāroti cakkhundriyādīsu chasu dvāresu susaṁvihitārakkho.
anya-e0103n1:52_17: Bhojane mattaññūti paribhuñjitabbato bhojanasaññite catubbidhepi paccaye pariyesanapaṭiggahaṇaparibhogādivasena sabbaso pamāṇaññū.
anya-e0103n1:52_18: Jāgariyamanuyuttoti pubbarattāpararattaṁ bhāvanāmanasikārasaṅkhātaṁ jāgariyaṁ sātaccakāritāvasena anu anu yutto tattha yuttapayutto.
anya-e0103n1:52_24: Ayaṁ vuccati ācāroti ayaṁ sagāravatādi atthakāmehi ācaritabbato ācāro.
anya-e0103n1:53_1: Satisaṅkhāto cittassa ārakkhabhūto eva gocaro ārakkhagocaro.
anya-e0103n1:53_3: Appicchatādīhi dasahi vivaṭṭanissitāya kathāya vatthubhūtehi guṇehi samannāgato dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato.
anya-e0103n1:53_4: Tato eva kalyāṇo sundaro mittoti kalyāṇamitto.
anya-e0103n1:53_8: Sutaṁ pariyodāpetīti tameva yathāsutaṁ avisadatāya apariyodātaṁ punappunaṁ paripucchanādinā visodheti nijjaṭaṁ nigumbaṁ karoti.
anya-e0103n1:53_12: ratanattaye ca sammādiṭṭhiyā ujukaraṇena diṭṭhiṁ ujuṁ karoti.
anya-e0103n1:53_13: Tato eva ca duvidhāyapi saddhāsampadāya cittaṁ pasādeti.
anya-e0103n1:53_14: Atha vā yathāsutaṁ dhammaṁ pariyodapetvā tatthāgate rūpārūpadhamme pariggahetvā sapaccayaṁ nāmarūpaṁ
anya-e0103n1:53_16: Dhammānaṁ paccayapaccayuppannatāmattadassanena tīsupi addhāsu kaṅkhaṁ vitarati.
anya-e0103n1:53_17: Tato paraṁ ca udayabbayañāṇādivasena vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā ariyabhūmiṁ okkamanto aveccapasādena ratanattaye cittaṁ pasādeti.
anya-e0103n1:53_18: Tathābhūtova tassa kalyāṇamittassa anusikkhanena saddhādīhi guṇehi na hāyati,
anya-e0103n1:54_1: taṁ etassāti vā ‘‘antaraghara’’nti laddhanāmaṁ gocaragāmaṁ paviṭṭho.
anya-e0103n1:54_2: Tattha ghare ghare bhikkhāpariyesanāya vīthiṁ paṭipanno.
anya-e0103n1:56_0: ‘‘Yathā thambhe nibandheyya, vacchaṁ damaṁ naro idha;
anya-e0103n1:57_2: (visuddhi. 1.217; dī. ni. aṭṭha. 2.374; ma. ni. aṭṭha. 1.107; pārā. aṭṭha. 2.165; paṭi. ma. aṭṭha. 2.1.163);
anya-e0103n1:58_1: Tattha sako pettiko visayoti attano pitu sammāsambuddhassa santako,
anya-e0103n1:59_6: Tathā hi mātikāyaṁ pārājikādīnaṁ viya sekhiyānaṁ paricchedo na kato.
anya-e0103n1:59_7: Evañca katvā ‘‘asañcicca āpannasekhiyā’’ti asañciccaggahaṇaṁ samatthitaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n1:59_8: Na hi mātikāyaṁ āgatesu pañcasattatiyā sekhiyesu nosaññāvimokkho nāma atthi,
anya-e0103n1:59_10: Keci panettha asiñcicca āpannaggahaṇena acittakāpattiyo gahitāti vadanti,
anya-e0103n1:59_15: Tenāha ‘‘yāni tāni vajjāni appamattakāni oramattakāni lahukāni lahusammatānī’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n1:59_16: Ādisaddena pātimokkhasaṁvaravisuddhatthaṁ anatikkamanīyānaṁ anāpattigamanīyānaṁ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n1:59_18: sabbalahukaṁ vā dubbhāsitamattaṁ pārājikasadisaṁ katvā dassanasabhāvo.
anya-e0103n1:59_19: Yaṁ kiñcīti mūlapaññattianupaññattisabbatthapaññattipadesapaññattiādibhedaṁ yaṁ kiñci sikkhitabbaṁ paṭipajjitabbaṁ pūretabbaṁ sīlaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:59_22: Ayaṁ pana ācāragocarasampadā kiṁ pātimokkhasīle pariyāpannā,
anya-e0103n1:59_25: Yadi evaṁ kasmā puna vuttāti codanaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘ettha cā’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n1:61_2: tasmiṁ satiyeva icchitabbanti vuttaṁ ‘‘soti pātimokkhasaṁvarasīle ṭhito bhikkhū’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:61_3: Sampādite hi etasmiṁ pātimokkhasaṁvarasīlaṁ suguttaṁ surakkhitameva hoti,
anya-e0103n1:61_11: Cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvāti ettha yadi cakkhu rūpaṁ passeyya,
anya-e0103n1:61_22: Tañca kenaci kuṭṭādinā antarite na uppajjati,
anya-e0103n1:61_27: na yaṁ kiñcīti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṁ cakkhuṁ sandhāyetaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘cakkhunā rūpaṁ disvā’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:62_2: Pasādavatthukena cittenāti cakkhupasādavatthukena tannissāya pavattena viññāṇena,
anya-e0103n1:62_5: Cakkhupasādasannissaye hi viññāṇe ālokānuggahitaṁ rūpārammaṇaṁ sannissayaguṇena obhāsente taṁsamaṅgipuggalo ‘‘rūpaṁ passatī’’ti vuccati.
anya-e0103n1:62_8: Usunā lakkhassa vedhe sijjhante tassa sambhārabhūtena dhanunā vijjhatīti vacanaṁ viya viññāṇena rūpadassane
anya-e0103n1:62_9: sijjhante cakkhunā rūpaṁ passatīti īdisī sasambhārakathā nāmesā hoti.
anya-e0103n1:62_14: kevalena vā viññāṇena rūpadassanaṁ natthi, tasmā.
anya-e0103n1:63_0: Itthipurisanimittaṁ vāti ettha itthisantānanissitarūpamukhena gayhamānaṁ saṇṭhānaṁ thanamaṁsāvisadatā
anya-e0103n1:63_1: nimmassumukhatā kesabandhanavatthaggahaṇaṁ avisadaṭṭhānagamanādi ca sabbaṁ ‘‘itthī’’ti sañjānanassa kāraṇabhāvato
anya-e0103n1:63_4: Subhanimittādikaṁ vāti ettha rāguppattihetubhūto iṭṭhākāro subhanimittaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:63_10: Tathā hi vakkhati ‘‘muṭṭhasaccaṁ vā aññāṇaṁ vā’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:63_18: na tato paraṁ kiñci subhādiākāraṁ parikappeti.
anya-e0103n1:63_20: Visabhāgavatthuno hi hatthādiavayavesu subhādito parikappentassa aparāparaṁ tattha uppajjamānā kilesā paribyattā hontīti te tesaṁ anubyañjanā nāma.
anya-e0103n1:63_21: Te pana yasmā tathā tathā sanniviṭṭhānaṁ bhūtupādāyarūpānaṁ sannivesākāro.
anya-e0103n1:63_22: Na hi taṁ muñcitvā paramatthato hatthādi nāma koci atthi.
anya-e0103n1:63_25: Kiṁ pana gaṇhātīti āha ‘‘yaṁ tattha bhūtaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:63_27: Yaṁ tasmiṁ sarīre vijjamānaṁ kesalomādi bhūtupādāyamattaṁ vā,
anya-e0103n1:63_29: Tattha asubhākāragahaṇassa nidassanaṁ dassento ‘‘cetiyapabbatavāsī’’tiādinā mahātissattheravatthuṁ āhari.
anya-e0103n1:64_0: Tattha sumaṇḍitapasādhitāti suṭṭhu maṇḍitā pasādhitā ca.
anya-e0103n1:64_7: Olokentoti thero kammaṭṭhānamanasikāreneva gacchanto saddakaṇṭakattā pubbabhāgamanasikārassa hasitasaddānusārena ‘‘kimeta’’nti olokento.
anya-e0103n1:64_10: Arahattaṁ pāpuṇīti thero kira tassā hasantiyā dantaṭṭhidassaneneva pubbabhāgabhāvanāya subhāvitattā paṭibhāganimittaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:64_11: sātisayañca upacārajjhānaṁ labhitvā yathāṭhitova tattha paṭhamajjhānaṁ adhigantvā taṁ pādakaṁ katvā vipassanaṁ
anya-e0103n1:64_13: Pubbasaññaṁ anussarīti pubbakaṁ yathāraddhaṁ kālena kālaṁ anuyuñjiyamānaṁ aṭṭhikakammaṭṭhānaṁ anussari samannāhari.
anya-e0103n1:64_15: Therassa kira bhāvanāya paguṇabhāvato dantaṭṭhidassaneneva tassā sakalasarīraṁ aṭṭhikasaṅghātabhāvena upaṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n1:65_0: ‘‘Yassa cakkhundriyāsaṁvarassa hetū’’ti vatvā puna ‘‘tassa cakkhundriyassa satikavāṭena pidahanatthāyā’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:65_2: Yadidaṁ yaṁ cakkhundriyāsaṁvarassa hetu abhijjhādianvāssavanaṁ dassitaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:65_3: taṁ asaṁvutacakkhundriyasseva hetu pavattaṁ dassitanti katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:65_4: Cakkhudvārikassa hi abhijjhādianvāssavanassa taṁdvārikaviññāṇassa viya cakkhundriyaṁ padhānakāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:65_5: Cakkhundriyassa asaṁvutatte sati te anvāssavantīti asaṁvariyamānacakkhundriyahetuko so asaṁvaro tathā vuttoti.
anya-e0103n1:65_6: Yatvādhikaraṇanti hi yassa cakkhundriyassa kāraṇāti attho.
anya-e0103n1:66_0: Javanakkhaṇe pana sace dussīlyaṁ vātiādi puna avacanatthaṁ idheva sabbaṁ vuttanti chasu dvāresu yathāsambhavaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:66_1: Na hi pañcadvāre kāyavacīduccaritasaṅkhātaṁ dussīlyaṁ atthi,
anya-e0103n1:66_4: Muṭṭhasaccādīnaṁ hi satipaṭipakkhākusaladhammādibhāvato siyā pañcadvāre uppatti,
anya-e0103n1:66_5: na tveva kāyikavācasikavītikkamabhūtassa dussīlyassa tattha uppatti,
anya-e0103n1:66_7: Dussīlyādayo cettha pañca asaṁvarā sīlasaṁvarādīnaṁ pañcannaṁ saṁvarānaṁ paṭipakkhabhāvena vuttā.
anya-e0103n1:67_0: Yathākinti yena pakārena javane uppajjamāno asaṁvaro ‘‘cakkhundriye asaṁvaro’’ti vuccati,
anya-e0103n1:67_2: Yathātiādinā nagaradvāre asaṁvare sati taṁsambandhānaṁ gharādīnaṁ asaṁvutatā viya javane asaṁvare sati
anya-e0103n1:67_3: taṁsambandhānaṁ dvārādīnaṁ asaṁvutatāti evaṁ aññāsaṁvare aññāsaṁvutatā sāmaññameva nidasseti,
anya-e0103n1:67_6: Sati vā dvārabhavaṅgādike puna uppajjamānaṁ javanaṁ bāhiraṁ viya katvā nagaradvārasamānaṁ vuttaṁ ,
anya-e0103n1:67_8: Paccayabhāvena hi purimanipphannaṁ javanakāle asantampi bhavaṅgādi cakkhādi viya phalanipphattiyā santaṁyeva nāma hoti.
anya-e0103n1:67_10: ‘‘Bāhiraṁ viya katvā’’ti ca paramatthato javanassa bāhirabhāve,
anya-e0103n1:67_14: 1.49) vacanato āgantukabhūtassa kadāci kadāci uppajjamānassa javanassa bāhirabhāvo,
anya-e0103n1:67_15: tabbidhurasabhāvassa itarassa abbhantarabhāvo ekena pariyāyena hotīti katvā vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:67_16: Javane vā asaṁvare uppanne tato paraṁ dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṁ asaṁvarahetubhāvāpattito.
anya-e0103n1:67_17: Asaṁvarassa hi uppattiyā dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṁ tassa hetubhāvo paññāyatīti.
anya-e0103n1:67_18: Nagaradvārasadisena javanena pavisitvā dussīlyādicorānaṁ dvārabhavaṅgādīsu musanaṁ kusalabhaṇḍavināsanaṁ kathitaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:67_20: so tattha dvārādīnaṁ saṁvarūpanissayabhāvaṁ upacchindantoyeva pavattatīti.
anya-e0103n1:67_21: Dvārabhavaṅgādīnaṁ javanena saha sambandho ekasantatipariyāpannato daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n1:68_0: Ettha ca cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe āpāthagate niyamitādivasena kusalākusalajavane sattakkhattuṁ uppajjitvā
anya-e0103n1:68_1: bhavaṅgaṁ otiṇṇe tadanurūpameva manodvārikajavane tasmiṁyevārammaṇe sattakkhattuṁyeva uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṁ
anya-e0103n1:68_2: otiṇṇe puna tasmiṁyeva dvāre tadevārammaṇaṁ nissāya ‘‘itthī puriso’’tiādinā vavatthapentaṁ pasādarajjanādivasena
anya-e0103n1:68_4: Evaṁ pavattamānaṁ javanaṁ sandhāya ‘‘javane dussīlyādīsu uppannesu tasmiṁ asaṁvare sati dvārampi agutta’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:69_2: Yathā hi pageva satiārakkhaṁ anupaṭṭhapentassa dussīlyādīnaṁ uppatti,
anya-e0103n1:69_3: evaṁ pageva satiārakkhaṁ upaṭṭhapentassa sīlādīnaṁ uppatti veditabbā.
anya-e0103n1:69_5: Sotaviññāṇena hi saddaṁ sutvā ‘‘itthisaddo’’ti vā ‘‘purisasaddo’’ti vā iṭṭhāniṭṭhādikaṁ vā kilesavatthubhūtaṁ nimittaṁ na gaṇhāti,
anya-e0103n1:69_7: Yo ca gītasaddādikassa kilesānaṁ anu anu byañjanato ‘‘anubyañjana’’nti laddhavohāro mandatārādivasena vavatthito chajjādibhedabhinno ākāro,
anya-e0103n1:69_10: Manodvāre pana sāvajjanabhavaṅgaṁ manodvāraṁ tasmiṁ dvāre dhammārammaṇe āpāthagate taṁ javanamanasāva viññāya vijānitvātiādinā yojetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:71_1: Tathā hi ‘‘ājīvahetu paññattānaṁ channaṁ sikkhāpadāna’’nti paduddhāraṁ katvā tāni pāḷivaseneva dassetuṁ ‘‘yāni tānī’’tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:71_2: Tattha yāni tāni evaṁ paññattāni cha sikkhāpadānīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n1:71_11: Anuppannattā hi tassa taṁ asantanti purimassa pacchimaṁ kāraṇavacanaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:71_18: pārājikasaññitassa vā vītikkamassa āpajjanaṁ ullapananti attho.
anya-e0103n1:71_22: ‘‘Imesaṁ channaṁ sikkhāpadānaṁ vītikkamassa vasenā’’ti sambandho heṭṭhā dassito eva.
anya-e0103n1:73_2: Te eva sakkaccaṁ ādaravasena diyyamānā sakkārā.
anya-e0103n1:73_6: Asantaguṇadīpanakāmassāti asante attani avijjamāne saddhādiguṇe sambhāvetukāmassa.
anya-e0103n1:73_9: Icchāya apakatassāti pāpikāya icchāya sammāājīvato apeto katoti apakato.
anya-e0103n1:73_10: Tathābhūto ca ājīvūpaddavena upaddutoti katvā āha ‘‘upaddutassāti attho’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:74_1: Tividhampetaṁ tattha āgataṁ tassa nissayabhūtāya imāya pāḷiyā dassetunti evamattho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n1:74_5: Paṭiggahaṇena cāti ca-saddena pubbe vuttaṁ paṭikkhipanaṁ samuccinoti.
anya-e0103n1:75_2: tasmā ‘‘dhāreyyā’’ti ettha yadetaṁ saṅghāṭiṁ katvā dhāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:76_0: Attānaṁ uttarimanussadhammādhigamassa sāmante katvā jappanaṁ sāmantajappanaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:76_3: ‘‘Mitto’’ti sāmaññato vatvā puna taṁ viseseti ‘‘sandiṭṭho sambhatto’’ti .
anya-e0103n1:76_21: Tassa kira ekapasse bhitti uccatarā hoti,
anya-e0103n1:76_30: Yassa gopānasiyo aggahetvā iṭṭhakāhi eva chadanaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n1:77_8: Mukhasambhāvikoti korajikakorajikādibhāvena pavattavacanehi attano mukhamattena aññehi sambhāviko.
anya-e0103n1:77_9: So evarūpo evarūpatāya eva attānaṁ paraṁ viya katvā ‘‘ayaṁ samaṇo’’tiādīni katheti.
anya-e0103n1:78_0: Sambhāvanādhippāyakatenāti ‘‘kathaṁ nu kho maṁ jano ‘ariyo’ti vā ‘visesalābhī’ti vā sambhāveyyā’’ti iminā adhippāyena katena.
anya-e0103n1:78_1: Gamanaṁ saṇṭhapetīti visesalābhīnaṁ gamanaṁ viya attano gamanaṁ sakkaccaṁ ṭhapeti ,
anya-e0103n1:78_6: Āpāthakajjhāyīti manussānaṁ āpāthaṭṭhāne samādhisamāpanno viya nisīdanto āpāthake janassa pākaṭaṭṭhāne jhāyī.
anya-e0103n1:79_0: Paccayapaṭisevanasaṅkhātenāti ayoniso uppāditānaṁ paccayānaṁ paṭisevananti evaṁ kathitena,
anya-e0103n1:79_2: Aññaṁ viya katvā attano samīpe bhaṇanaṁ sāmantajappitaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:79_6: kuhassa vā puggalassa ayanā gati kiriyā kuhāyanā. Kuheti,
anya-e0103n1:81_1: Dve kira bhikkhū ekaṁ gāmaṁ pavisitvā āsanasālāya nisīditvā ekaṁ kumārikaṁ pakkosiṁsu.
anya-e0103n1:81_2: Tāya āgatāya tatreko ekaṁ pucchi ‘‘ayaṁ, bhante,
anya-e0103n1:81_5: imissā mātā mayi gehaṁ gate sappiṁ dadamānā ghaṭeneva deti,
anya-e0103n1:81_6: ayampi mātā viya ghaṭena detī’’ti (vibha. aṭṭha.
anya-e0103n1:82_3: dhammaṁ bhaṇe nādhammaṁ taṁ dutiya’’nti (saṁ. ni. 1.213; su. ni. 452).
anya-e0103n1:82_5: saccato vā aññā subhāsitā vācā ‘‘dhammo’’ti veditabbo.
anya-e0103n1:84_4: Taṁ pana avahasitvā vacanaṁ hotīti āha ‘‘uppaṇḍanā’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:84_10: Nipisitvā gandhamagganā viyāti anippisite alabbhamānassa gandhassa nipisane lābho viya paraguṇe anippisite
anya-e0103n1:85_0: Nikattuṁ appena lābhena bahukaṁ vañcetvā gahetuṁ icchanaṁ nijigīsanaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:86_5: Mūsikacchinnanti vatthādīnaṁ asukabhāge mūsikacchede sati idaṁ nāma phalaṁ hotīti jānanakasatthaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:86_6: Palāsaggiādīsu iminā nāma agginā hute idaṁ nāma hotīti aggivasena homavidhānaṁ aggihomaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:86_9: aññesañca sutte āgatānaṁ micchājīvānaṁ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n1:86_13: Na hi alaso ñāyena paccaye pariyesituṁ sakkotīti.
anya-e0103n1:88_2: Yonisoti cettha upāyattho yoniso-saddoti dassento āha ‘‘upāyena pathenā’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:88_3: ‘‘Paṭisaṅkhāya ñatvā’’ti vatvā tayidaṁ paṭisaṅkhānaṁ paccavekkhaṇanti dassetuṁ ‘‘paccavekkhitvāti attho’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:88_4: Yathā hi paccavekkhitvāti sītapaṭighātādikaṁ taṁ taṁ payojanaṁ pati pati avekkhitvā,
anya-e0103n1:88_6: evaṁ paṭisaṅkhāyāti tadeva payojanaṁ pati pati saṅkhāya,
anya-e0103n1:88_9: Ettha ca ‘‘paṭisaṅkhā yoniso’’tiādi kāmaṁ paccayaparibhogakālena vuccati,
anya-e0103n1:88_10: dhātuvasena pana paṭikūlavasena vā paccavekkhaṇāya paccayasannissitasīlaṁ sujjhatīti apare.
anya-e0103n1:88_12: Eke pana paṭhamaṁ eva pariyattanti vadanti,
anya-e0103n1:88_14: ‘‘Cīvara’’nti ekavacanaṁ ekattamattaṁ vācakanti adhippāyena ‘‘antaravāsakādīsu yaṁ kiñcī’’ti vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:88_15: jātisaddatāya pana tassa pāḷiyaṁ ekavacananti yattakāni cīvarāni yoginā pariharitabbāni,
anya-e0103n1:88_16: tesaṁ sabbesaṁ ekajjhaṁ gahaṇanti sakkā viññātuṁ,
anya-e0103n1:88_19: ‘‘Nivāseti vā pārupati vā’’ti vikappanaṁ pana paṭisevanapariyāyassa paribhogassa vibhāgadassananti taṁ
anya-e0103n1:89_3: Idāni taṁ niyamaṁ vivaritvā dassetuṁ ‘‘ettakameva hī’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:89_6: Līḷāvasena hi ekacce sattā vatthāni paridahanti ceva upasaṁviyanti ca.
anya-e0103n1:89_14: Vā-saddena hemantādīsu himapātādivasena pavattassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0103n1:89_21: Ekacco dāvaggisantāpo kāyaṁ cīvarena paṭicchādetvā sakkā vinodetunti āha ‘‘tassa vanadāhādīsu sambhavo veditabbo’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:89_36: Hiriyitabbaṭṭhena hirī ca taṁ kopinañcāti hirikopinanti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n1:89_37: Tassa cāti ca-saddo pubbe vuttapayojanānaṁ sampiṇḍanattho.
anya-e0103n1:90_0: Yaṁ kiñci āhāranti khādanīyabhojanīyādibhedaṁ yaṁ kiñci āharitabbavatthuṁ.
anya-e0103n1:90_6: Piṇḍānaṁ vā pātoti ghare ghare laddhabhikkhānaṁ sannipāto.
anya-e0103n1:90_16: Porisamadanimittanti porisamado vuccati purisamāno ‘‘ahaṁ puriso’’ti uppajjanakamāno.
anya-e0103n1:91_3: mohañca vaḍḍhetīti tassā vajjanena mohassa anupanissayatā.
anya-e0103n1:91_9: Yadipi ekaccassa davamade ārabbha parassa paṭighasaṁyojanādīnaṁ uppatti hotiyeva manopadosikadevādīnaṁ viya,
anya-e0103n1:91_10: attano pana davamade ārabbha yesaṁ savisesaṁ rāgamohamānādayo pāpadhammā uppajjanti.
anya-e0103n1:91_11: Te sandhāya ‘‘attano saṁyojanuppattipaṭisedhanattha’’nti vatvā maṇḍanavibhūsanāni paṭicca savisesaṁ parassapi
anya-e0103n1:91_13: Ayoniso paṭipattiyāti ettha kāmasukhallikānuyogaṁ muñcitvā sabbāpi micchāpaṭipatti ayoniso paṭipatti.
anya-e0103n1:91_15: pacchimehi dvīhi kāmasukhallikānuyogassa pahānaṁ vuttanti vadanti.
anya-e0103n1:91_16: ‘‘Catūhipi cetehī’’ti pana vacanato sabbehi ubhinnampi pahānaṁ vuttanti veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:92_3: Sā panassa ṭhiti pabandhavasena icchitāti āha ‘‘pabandhaṭṭhitattha’’nti.
anya-e0103n1:92_9: tāva avatthānaṁ yāpanāti dassento ‘‘cirakālaṭṭhitatthaṁ vā’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n1:92_12: yathā jiṇṇagharasāmiko gharassa upatthambhanaṁ karoti tassa apatanatthaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:92_13: yathā ca sākaṭiko akkhabbhañjanaṁ karoti tassa sampavattanatthaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:92_16: Etena ṭhiti nāma apatanaṁ yāpanā pavattīti dasseti.
anya-e0103n1:92_21: ṭhitiyā yāpanāyāti kāyassa ṭhitihetutāya ‘‘ṭhitī’’ti laddhavohārassa jīvitindriyassa pavattanatthanti attho.
anya-e0103n1:92_28: Uṇhasītādīsu abhibhavantesu tappaṭikāraṁ sītuṇhaṁ viya paṭisevatīti sambandho.
anya-e0103n1:92_29: Maggabrahmacariyaṁ ṭhapetvā sikkhattayasaṅgahā sāsanāvacaritabbā anusāsanī sāsanabrahmacariyanti āha
anya-e0103n1:92_32: Kāyabalaṁ nissāyāti yathāsamāraddhaṁ guṇavisesapāripūrihetubhūtaṁ kāyabalamattaṁ nissāya.
anya-e0103n1:92_35: nadīsamuddanittharaṇatthikā ca puttamaṁsādīni yathā agiddhā amucchitā kevalaṁ taṁ taṁ atthasiddhimeva avekkhantā paṭisevanti tehi vinā asijjhanato,
anya-e0103n1:92_36: evamayampi kevalaṁ bhavakantāranittharaṇatthiko agiddho amucchito tena vinā asijjhanato piṇḍapātaṁ paṭisevatīti upamāsaṁsandanaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:93_1: Tena paṭiseviyamānassa piṇḍapātassa paṭisevanākāro gayhatīti āha ‘‘evaṁ iminā piṇḍapātapaṭisevanenā’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:93_4: Navañca vedanaṁ na uppādessāmīti paṭisevatīti yojanā. Kīdisaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:93_7: Aparimitaṁ aparimāṇaṁ bhojanaṁ paccayo etissāti aparimitabhojanapaccayā,
anya-e0103n1:93_8: taṁ aparimitabhojanapaccayaṁ attano gahaṇītejapamāṇato atikkantapamāṇabhojanahetukanti attho.
anya-e0103n1:93_9: Yo bahuṁ bhuñjitvā attano dhammatāya uṭṭhātuṁ asakkonto ‘‘āhara hattha’’nti vadati,
anya-e0103n1:93_11: Yo bhuñjitvā accuddhumātakucchitāya uṭṭhitopi sāṭakaṁ nivāsetuṁ na sakkoti,
anya-e0103n1:93_13: Yo bhuñjitvā uṭṭhātuṁ asakkonto tattheva parivattati,
anya-e0103n1:93_18: Yo bhuñjitvā mukhe sandhāretuṁ asakkonto tattheva vamati,
anya-e0103n1:93_21: Atha vā purāṇavedanā nāma abhuttapaccayā uppajjanakavedanā.
anya-e0103n1:93_25: Atha vā navavedanā nāma abhuttapaccayena uppajjanakavedanā,
anya-e0103n1:93_31: bhuttapaccayena ca uppajjanakānuppajjanakavedanāsu purimā yathāpavattā jighacchānimittā vedanā.
anya-e0103n1:93_34: Sā hi bhuttapaccayā pubbe anuppannāva nuppajjissatīti ayametāsaṁ viseso.
anya-e0103n1:94_2: Asappāyāparimitabhojanaṁ nissāyāti asappāyāparimitassa āhārassa bhuñjanapayogaṁ āgamma uppajjatīti attho.
anya-e0103n1:94_3: Purāṇakammapaccayavasenāti pubbe purimajātiyaṁ katattā purāṇassa kammassa paccayatāvasena payogavipattiṁ
anya-e0103n1:94_4: āgamma uppajjanārahatāya taṁ vajjetvā payogasampattiyā upaṭṭhāpanaṁ dukkhavedanāpaccayaghāto,
anya-e0103n1:94_5: paṭihananañca hotīti āha ‘‘tassā paccayaṁ vināsento taṁ purāṇañca vedanaṁ paṭihaṅkhāmī’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:94_8: Taṁ nissāya paṭicca āyatiṁ anāgate kāle uppajjanato yā cāyaṁ ‘‘navavedanā’’ti vuccatīti yojanā.
anya-e0103n1:94_10: tassā navavedanāya mūlaṁ ayuttaparibhogakammaṁ anibbattento sabbena sabbaṁ anuppādento.
anya-e0103n1:94_12: ‘‘Vihiṁsūparatiyā’’tiādinā vā padacatukkena yuttaparibhogasaṅgaho pabbajitānucchavikassa paccayaparibhogassa vuttattā.
anya-e0103n1:94_14: Jhānasukhādīnaṁ paccayabhūtassa kāyasukhassa avissajjanato dhammikasukhāpariccāgo ca dīpito hoti.
anya-e0103n1:95_3: Tathā sati cirakālappavattisaṅkhātā sarīrassa yātrā yāpanā bhavissatīti imamatthaṁ dassento ‘‘parimitaparibhogena…pe…
anya-e0103n1:95_5: Yo rogo sāddho asāddho ca na hoti,
anya-e0103n1:95_14: idha pana catunnampi iriyāpathānaṁ avicchedasaṅkhātā yāpanā yātrāti ayamettha viseso.
anya-e0103n1:95_21: Tesaṁ parivajjanaṁ dhammena samena paccayuppādanādivasena veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:95_22: Dhammena hi paccaye pariyesitvā dhammena paṭiggahetvā paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjanaṁ anavajjatā nāma.
anya-e0103n1:96_7: ‘‘laddhaṁ me’’ti pamāṇādhikaṁ bhuñjitvā taṁ jīrāpetuṁ asakkonto uddhaṁvirecanaadhovirecanādīhi kilamati,
anya-e0103n1:96_9: Aññe te ‘‘kiṁ ida’’nti pucchitvā ‘‘asukassa udaraṁ uddhumāta’’ntiādīni sutvā ‘‘niccakālamesa evaṁpakatiko
anya-e0103n1:96_10: attano kucchipamāṇaṁ nāma na jānātī’’ti nindanti,
anya-e0103n1:96_13: Attano hi pakatiaggibalādiṁ jānitvā ‘‘evaṁ me aratiādīnaṁ abhāvena kāyasukhatā,
anya-e0103n1:96_16: tassa sādhanena yāvadatthaṁ udarassa paripūraṇena udarāvadehakaṁ bhojanaṁ yāvadatthaudarāvadehakabhojanaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:96_19: ubhohi passehi samparivattanakaṁ sayantassa uppajjanasukhaṁ passasukhaṁ ,
anya-e0103n1:96_22: sukhānaṁ pahānato catunnaṁ iriyāpathānaṁ yogyabhāvassa paṭipādanaṁ kāyassa catuiriyāpathayogyabhāvapaṭipādanaṁ, tato.
anya-e0103n1:96_25: sabbavikappesu vā vuttaṁ phāsuvihāralakkhaṇaṁ āgamena samatthetuṁ ‘‘vuttampi heta’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:96_26: Tīsupi vikappesu āhārassa ūnaparibhogavaseneva hi phāsuvihāro vuttoti.
anya-e0103n1:97_4: Imasmiṁ pana ṭhāne aṭṭha aṅgāni samodhānetabbāni –
anya-e0103n1:97_15: Mahāsivatthero panāha ‘‘heṭṭhā cattāri aṅgāni paṭikkhepo nāma,
anya-e0103n1:97_17: Tattha ‘‘yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā’’ti ekaṁ aṅgaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:97_26: Evaṁ aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṁ āhāraṁ āhārento paṭisaṅkhā yoniso piṇḍapātaṁ paṭisevati nāma.
anya-e0103n1:98_4: Yattha yattha vihāre vā aḍḍhayogādimhi vā āsatīti vihāraaḍḍhayogādike ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:98_8: Utuyeva utuparissayoti sītuṇhādiutuyeva asappāyo vuttanayena utuparissayo.
anya-e0103n1:98_12: Nānārammaṇato paṭisaṁharitvā kammaṭṭhānabhūte ekasmiṁyeva ārammaṇe cittassa sammadeva layanaṁ paṭisallānaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:98_15: Senāsanaṁ hi vivittaṁ yogino bhāvanānukūlaṁ suññāgārabhāvato.
anya-e0103n1:98_16: Taṁ panetaṁ atthadvayaṁ vibhāvetuṁ ‘‘yo sarīrābādhacittavikkhepakaro’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:99_1: ‘‘utu ca sītuṇha’’nti sītuṇhapaṭighātaṁ vatvā utuparissayavinodanaṁ kasmā vuttanti codanaṁ sandhāyāha ‘‘kāmañcā’’tiādi.
anya-e0103n1:99_2: Tattha ‘‘niyataṁ utuparissayavinodana’’nti etena ‘‘sītassa paṭighātāya uṇhassa paṭighātāyā’’ti ettha
anya-e0103n1:99_3: vuttaṁ sītuṇhaṁ aniyataṁ kadāci kadāci uppajjanakaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:99_6: asappāyo’’ti ca evaṁ vuttappakāro vivaṭaṅgaṇarukkhamūlādīsu nisinnassa apariguttiyā asaṁvutadvārāditāya pākaṭaparissayā,
anya-e0103n1:99_7: asappāyarūpadassanādinā apākaṭaparissayā ca bhikkhussa kāyacittānaṁ ābādhaṁ kareyyuṁ.
anya-e0103n1:99_8: Yattha gutte senāsane ābādhaṁ na karonti.
anya-e0103n1:99_9: Evaṁ jānitvāti ubhayaparissayarahitanti evaṁ ñatvā paṭisevanto bhikkhu veditabboti sambandho.
anya-e0103n1:100_9: Vivaṭaparikkhepo parikkhā uḍḍāpo pākāro esikā paligho pākārapatthaṇḍilanti satta ‘‘nagaraparikkhārā’’ti vadanti.
anya-e0103n1:100_14: Samudānetabbāti sammā uddhaṁ uddhaṁ ānetabbā pariyesitabbā.
anya-e0103n1:101_2: Verikānaṁ antaraṁ adatvā attano sāmikānaṁ parivāretvā ṭhitasevakā viya rakkhaṇato.
anya-e0103n1:101_5: Rasāyanabhūtaṁ hi bhesajjaṁ sucirampi kālaṁ jīvitaṁ pavattetiyeva.
anya-e0103n1:101_6: Yadipi anuppannā eva dukkhavedanā bhesajjaparibhogena paṭihaññanti,
anya-e0103n1:101_13: Sañcayato paṭṭhāya so dhātukkhobho samuṭṭhānaṁ etesanti taṁsamuṭṭhānā.
anya-e0103n1:101_14: ‘‘Dukkhavedanā’’ti vatvā sā akusalasabhāvāpi atthīti tato visesetuṁ ‘‘akusalavipākavedanā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:102_0: Cīvarādīnaṁ paccayānaṁ nissayanaṁ paribhogo evāti dassetuṁ ‘‘te paṭicca nissāyā’’ti vatvā ‘‘paribhuñjamānā’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:104_1: Evaṁ pātimokkhasaṁvarādibhedena niddiṭṭhaṁ sīlaṁ puna sādhanavibhāgena dassetuṁ ‘‘evametasmi’’ntiādimāraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:104_4: Nanu ca vīriyasatipaññāhipi vinā pātimokkhasaṁvaro na sijjhatīti?
anya-e0103n1:104_6: saddhāya pana visesahetubhāvaṁ sandhāya evaṁ vuttanti dassento āha
anya-e0103n1:105_1: Garukalahukādibhede otiṇṇe vatthusmiṁ tassa tassa aparādhassa anurūpaṁ sikkhāpadapaññāpanaṁ nāma sāvakānaṁ avisayo,
anya-e0103n1:105_5: buddhānaṁ eva visayoti dassento ‘‘sikkhāpadapaññattiyācanapaṭikkhepo cettha nidassana’’nti āha.
anya-e0103n1:106_0: Kikīva aṇḍanti kikīsakuṇikā viya attano aṇḍaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:106_1: Sā kira jīvitampi pariccajitvā aṇḍameva rakkhati.
anya-e0103n1:106_2: Camarīva vāladhinti camarīmigo viya attano vāladhiṁ.
anya-e0103n1:106_3: Camarīmigā kira byādhena paripātiyamānā jīvitampi pariccajitvā kaṇḍakagumbādīsu laggaṁ attano vālameva rakkhanti.
anya-e0103n1:106_5: Yathā hi ekaputtako kuṭumbiko taṁ ekaputtaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:106_6: ekanayano ca taṁ ekanayanaṁ suṭṭhutaraṁ rakkhati.
anya-e0103n1:107_0: Evameva khoti yathā mahāsamuddo ṭhitadhammo velaṁ nātikkamati, evameva.
anya-e0103n1:109_2: Yassa hi kilesasīsaṁ avijjaṁ maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattamaggo pariyādiyati,
anya-e0103n1:109_3: tato ekūnavīsatime paccavekkhaṇañāṇe patiṭṭhāya bhavaṅgottaraṇe vaṭṭasīsaṁ jīvitindriyaṁ cuticittaṁ pariyādiyati,
anya-e0103n1:109_9: Appevāti appeva nāma attano jīvitampi jaheyya,
anya-e0103n1:110_0: Satiyāadhiṭṭhitānanti pageva upaṭṭhitāya satiyā ārakkhavasena adhiṭṭhitānaṁ indriyānaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:110_11: Anubyañjanaso nimittaggāhoti kilesānaṁ anu anu byañjanavasena uppādanena pākaṭīkaraṇavasena subhādinimittaggāho,
anya-e0103n1:111_6: Kilesuppattiyā hetubhāvena taṁsamaṅginaṁ hanantīti kāraṇūpacāreneva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:111_9: Te kīdisā vivaṭā arakkhitā asaṁvutacakkhādihetuṁ taṁsamaṅginaṁ hanantīti kāraṇūpacāreneva vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:112_1: Ayaṁ pana sabbaso kilesānaṁ anuppādo atiukkaṭṭhadesanā maggenāgatasadisattā.
anya-e0103n1:113_3: So ca pana dāho idāni cittagatoti dassento āha ‘‘cittaṁ me pariḍayhatī’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:114_2: Rāgūpasañhitaṁ rāguppattihetubhūtaṁ subhanimittaṁ parivajjehi na manasi karohi.
anya-e0103n1:114_4: atha kho asubhabhāvanāya attano cittaṁ bhāvehi. Kathaṁ?
anya-e0103n1:114_5: Ekaggaṁ susamāhitaṁ yathā taṁ asubhārammaṇe vikkhepābhāvena ekaggaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:114_8: Evaṁ samathabhāvanāya kāmarāgassa vikkhambhanaṁ dassetvā idāni samucchedanavidhiṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘saṅkhāre’’tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:114_9: Tattha saṅkhāre parato passāti sabbepi saṅkhāre avidheyyakatāya ‘‘pare’’ti passa.
anya-e0103n1:114_13: Evaṁ lakkhaṇattayaṁ āropetvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhento maggapaṭipāṭiyā catutthamaggena sabbaso nibbāpehi mahārāgaṁ
anya-e0103n1:114_16: evaṁ mā ḍayhittho punappunanti daḷhataraṁ rāgavinodane niyojesi.
anya-e0103n1:115_0: Evaṁ indriyasaṁvarasīlassa sampādane vidhiṁ dassetvā evaṁ taṁ susampāditaṁ hotīti nayaṁ dassetuṁ ‘‘apicā’’tiādinā
anya-e0103n1:115_2: Tattha ‘‘leṇaṁ na ullokitapubba’’nti idaṁ sabbattheva therassa yugamattadassitāya vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:115_3: Kiṁ pana thero senāsanaṁ na sodheti ?
anya-e0103n1:116_1: Taruṇā thaññapivanakā puttadhītaro yāsaṁ tā taruṇaputtā, tāsaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:116_2: Lañjāpesīti thanapaṭṭikāya thane bandhāpetvā rājamuddikāya lañjāpesi.
anya-e0103n1:116_3: Rājā theraṁ cirataraṁ daṭṭhuṁ kālavikkhepaṁ karonto ‘‘sve sīlāni gaṇhissāmī’’ti āha.
anya-e0103n1:116_4: Thero rañño ca deviyā ca vandanakāle sattākāramattaṁ gaṇhāti.
anya-e0103n1:116_5: Itthī purisoti pana vivekaṁ na karoti.
anya-e0103n1:116_7: ‘‘Aho suparisuddhasīlo vatāyaṁ ayyo’’ti daṇḍadīpikaṁ gahetvā aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0103n1:116_8: Atiparisuddhaṁ pākaṭanti sappāyalābhena kammaṭṭhānaṁ ativiya parisuddhaṁ vibhūtaṁ ahosi.
anya-e0103n1:116_9: Sakalaṁ pabbataṁ unnādayantoti pathavikampanena sakalaṁ pabbataṁ ekaṁ ninnādaṁ karonto.
anya-e0103n1:117_5: Tesu hi bhinnesu indriyānipi bhinnānīti vuccanti ārakkhābhāvato,
anya-e0103n1:117_6: indriyāneva vā nimittānubyañjanaggāhassa dvārabhūtāni bhinnāni nāma taṁsamaṅgino anatthuppattito,
anya-e0103n1:118_7: Sā eva satthusāsanassa na patirūpāti appatirūpaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:118_10: pariggahitadhutaṅgassa dhutaṅganiyamavirodhinī yassa kassaci sallekhavikopinī paṭipatti.
anya-e0103n1:118_14: ‘‘Parisuddhuppāde’’ti imināva dhammadesanādīnaṁ parisuddhāya samuṭṭhānatā dīpitā hotīti ‘‘dhammadesanādīhi cassa guṇehi pasannāna’’nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:118_16: Dhutaguṇe cassa pasannānanti etthāpi eseva nayo.
anya-e0103n1:118_22: Appicchatāya ukkaṁsagatāya micchājīvassa asambhavo evāti dassetuṁ ‘‘ekabyādhivūpasamattha’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:118_27: paccayagedhassa dūrasamussāritattā uttamo ca so ariyavaṁsiko cāti uttamaariyavaṁsiko.
anya-e0103n1:119_0: Nimittaṁ nāma paccaye uddissa yathā adhippāyo ñāyati evaṁ nimittakammaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:119_1: Obhāso nāma ujukameva akathetvā yathā adhippāyo vibhūto hoti,
anya-e0103n1:120_0: Dvāraṁ dinnanti rogasīsena paribhogassa dvāraṁ dinnaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:120_4: Na vaṭṭatīti sallekhapaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhitassa na vaṭṭati,
anya-e0103n1:120_6: ‘‘Ājīvaṁ pana kopetī’’ti imināva senāsanapaṭisaṁyuttadhutaṅgadharassa nimittādayo na vaṭṭantīti vadanti.
anya-e0103n1:121_0: Gaṇavāsaṁ pahāya araññāyatane paṭippassaddhivivekassa muddhabhūtāya aggaphalasamāpattiyā viharanto mahāthero ‘‘pavivekaṁ brūhayamāno’’ti vutto.
anya-e0103n1:121_8: tena me phāsu ahosī’’ti attano vacīnicchāraṇasaṅkhātaṁ uppattihetuṁ.
anya-e0103n1:121_12: ajjhāsayaṁ pana ajānantā ekacce puthujjanā tathā maññeyyuṁ,
anya-e0103n1:121_13: anāgate ca sabrahmacārino evaṁ mama diṭṭhānugatiṁ āpajjeyyunti paṭikkhipi.
anya-e0103n1:121_15: Tathā hi daharabhikkhuno ‘‘kassa sampannaṁ na manāpa’’nti (pāci. 209, 257, 612, 1228, 1234; cūḷava.

anya-e0103n1:122_5: Akāralopena hi niddeso ‘‘evaṁsa te’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.23; a. ni. 6.58;
anya-e0103n1:122_8: Bahi careti āsayato nikkhamitvā gocaraggahaṇavasena bahi yadi vicareyya.
anya-e0103n1:122_10: Loke hi ayuttabhojanaṁ odariyaṁ garahantā evaṁ vadanti ‘‘kiṁsu nāma tassa antāni bahi carantī’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:123_0: Mahātissatthero kira dubbhikkhakāle maggaṁ gacchanto bhattacchedena,
anya-e0103n1:123_1: maggakilamathena ca kilantakāyo dubbalo aññatarassa phalitassa ambassa mūle nipajji,
anya-e0103n1:123_2: bahūni ambaphalāni tahaṁ tahaṁ patitāni honti.

anya-e0103n1:124_0: ‘‘Na pitā napi te mātā, na ñāti napi bandhavo;
anya-e0103n1:126_0: Attānaṁ ovaditvā sammasanaṁ ārabhitvā vipassanaṁ vaḍḍhetvā tassa piṭṭhigato eva maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṁ sacchākāsi.
anya-e0103n1:127_1: tabbipariyāyato paccavekkhitaparibhoge ānisaṁsassa ca dassanaṁ ādīnavānisaṁsadassanaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:127_3: Kāraṇakāraṇampi hi kāraṇabhāvena vuccati yathā tiṇehi bhattaṁ siddhanti.
anya-e0103n1:127_4: Yena kāraṇena bhikkhuno apaccavekkhitaparibhogo nāma siyā,
anya-e0103n1:127_7: Tattha paccayagedhanti gedhaggahaṇeneva sammohopi gahitoti daṭṭhabbo tena saha pavattanato,
anya-e0103n1:127_9: Dhammena samena uppanneti idaṁ paccayānaṁ āgamanasuddhidassanaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:127_11: Paccayānaṁ hi idamatthitaṁ upadhāretvā paribhuñjanaṁ paccayasannissitasīlaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:127_12: Yasmā pana te paccayā ñāyādhigatā eva bhikkhunā paribhuñjitabbā,
anya-e0103n1:127_14: Yathāvuttena vidhināti ‘‘sītassa paṭighātāyā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.23; a. ni. 6.58; mahāni.
anya-e0103n1:128_2: tadupabhuñjako ca puggalo’’ti evaṁ dhātumanasikāravasena vā.
anya-e0103n1:128_3: Paṭikūlavasena vāti piṇḍapāte tāva āhāre paṭikūlasaññāvasena,
anya-e0103n1:128_5: imaṁ pūtikāyaṁ patvā ativiya jigucchanīyāni jāyantī’’ti evaṁ paṭikūlamanasikāravasena vā.
anya-e0103n1:128_7: Anavajjovaparibhogo āditova paññāya parisodhitattā adhiṭṭhahitvā ṭhapitapattacīvarānaṁ viyāti.
anya-e0103n1:129_1: Bhagavatāpi attano sāsane sīlavato paccayā anuññātā,
anya-e0103n1:129_7: dāyakehi ca apariccattattā dussīlassa paribhogo theyyāya paribhogo theyyaparibhogo.
anya-e0103n1:129_9: paṭiggāhakato dakkhiṇāvisuddhiyā abhāvato iṇaṁ gahetvā paribhogo viyāti attho.
anya-e0103n1:129_11: Cīvaraṁ kāyato mocetvā paribhoge paribhoge purebhatta…pe…
anya-e0103n1:129_13: Tathā asakkontena yathāvuttakālavisesavasena ekadivase catukkhattuṁ tikkhattuṁ dvikkhattuṁ sakiṁyeva vā paccavekkhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:129_20: so ‘‘neva davāyā’’tiādinā sace atītaparibhogapaccavekkhaṇaṁ na kareyyāti vadanti,
anya-e0103n1:129_28: Evaṁ santepīti yadipi dvīsupi ṭhānesu paccavekkhaṇā yuttā,
anya-e0103n1:130_0: Evaṁ paccayasannissitasīlassa visuddhiṁ dassetvā teneva pasaṅgena sabbāpi visuddhiyo dassetuṁ ‘‘catubbidhā hi suddhī’’tiādimāha.
anya-e0103n1:130_3: Vuṭṭhānassāpi cettha desanāya eva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n1:130_6: Dhammena samena paccayānaṁ pariyeṭṭhi eva suddhi pariyeṭṭhisuddhi.
anya-e0103n1:130_7: Catūsupi paccayesu vuttavidhinā paccavekkhaṇāva suddhi paccavekkhaṇasuddhi.
anya-e0103n1:130_9: Suddhimantesu pana desanā suddhi etassāti desanāsuddhi.
anya-e0103n1:131_3: anuññātesu eva ca paribhogasambhavato bhikkhūhi paribhuñjitabbapaccayā bhagavato santakā.
anya-e0103n1:131_7: Atthi me tumhesu anukampā ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṁ no āmisadāyādā’’’ti (ma. ni.
anya-e0103n1:131_8: 1.29) evaṁ pavattaṁ dhammadāyādasuttañca ettha etasmiṁ atthe sādhakaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:132_6: Tenāha ‘‘te hi taṇhāya dāsabyaṁ atītattā sāmino hutvā paribhuñjantī’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:133_4: Yo hi puthujjanassāpi sallekhapaṭipattiyaṁ ṭhitassa paccayagedhaṁ pahāya tattha tattha anupalittena cittena paribhogo,
anya-e0103n1:133_6: Sīlavato pana paccavekkhitaparibhogo dāyajjaparibhogo viya hoti,
anya-e0103n1:133_8: Tathā hi vuttaṁ ‘‘dāyajjaparibhogeyeva vā saṅgahaṁ gacchatī’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:133_14: Paccanīkattāti yathā iṇāyiko attano ruciyā icchitadesaṁ gantuṁ na labhati,
anya-e0103n1:133_15: evaṁ iṇaparibhogayutto lokato nissarituṁ na labhatīti tappaṭipakkhattā sīlavato paccavekkhitaparibhogo āṇaṇyaparibhogoti āha ‘‘āṇaṇyaparibhogo vā’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:133_16: Etena nippariyāyato catuparibhogavinimutto visuṁyevāyaṁ paribhogoti dasseti.
anya-e0103n1:134_0: Idāni tameva kiccakāritaṁ suttapadena vibhāvetuṁ ‘‘vuttampi ceta’’ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:134_6: Sutvāna dhammaṁ sugatena desitanti cīvarādīsu ‘‘paṭisaṅkhā yoniso cīvaraṁ paṭisevati sītassa paṭighātāyā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.23; a. ni. 6.58; mahāni.
anya-e0103n1:134_10: ‘‘pipāsāgelaññassa vūpasamanato pānīyampi gilānapaccayo’’ti āpamukhena dassitaṁ gilānapaccayaṁ,
anya-e0103n1:134_11: saṅghāṭiyādicīvaranti catubbidhaṁ paccayaṁ saṅkhāya ‘‘yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.23; 2.24; 3.75; saṁ. ni. 4.120; a. ni. 6.58; 8.9; dha. sa.
anya-e0103n1:134_13: Seve sevituṁ sakkuṇeyya uttamapaññassa bhagavato sāvako sekho vā puthujjano vā.
anya-e0103n1:135_7: Anuggahāti anukampāya bahumhi upanīte mattaṁ so jaññā jāneyya satataṁ sabbakālaṁ upaṭṭhito upaṭṭhitassati.
anya-e0103n1:135_8: Ālepanarūhane yathāti bhesajjalepanena vaṇassa ruhane viya,
anya-e0103n1:135_13: Amucchitoti taṇhāmucchāya amucchito gedhaṁ taṇhaṁ anāpanno.

anya-e0103n1:138_9: kusaladhammasamādānato vā pana paṭṭhāya yāva gotrabhū,
anya-e0103n1:138_10: tāva pavattakusaladhammappabandho sekkhadhamme āhacca ṭhito sekkhapariyanto.

anya-e0103n1:139_2: kalyāṇaputhujjanānañca sīlaṁ mahānubhāvatāya ānubhāvato apariyantamevāti āha ‘‘gaṇanavasena sapariyantattā’’ti.
anya-e0103n1:139_5: Peyyālamukhena niddiṭṭhāti tattha tattha satthārā desitavitthāranayena yathāvuttagaṇanato niddiṭṭhā.
anya-e0103n1:139_8: Gaṇanavasena sapariyantampi upasampannānaṁ sīlanti heṭṭhā vuttaṁ ānetvā sambandhitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n1:139_9: Yaṁ kiñci hi upasampannena sikkhitabbaṁ sīlaṁ nāma,
anya-e0103n1:140_0: Dhanaṁ caje aṅgavarassa hetu pāripanthikacorādīhi upadduto.
anya-e0103n1:140_6: Sikkhāpadaṁ avītikkammāti assāmikesu ambaphalesu bhūmiyaṁ patitesu samīpeyeva santesupi paṭiggāhakābhāvena
anya-e0103n1:141_1: sīlavantassa vā tuyhaṁ etādisaṁ aṁsena vāhaṇādikaṁ kiccaṁ karoti,
anya-e0103n1:141_3: Sudhotajātimaṇi viyāti catūsu pāsāṇesu sammadeva dhotajātimaṇi viya.
